snippet: This time of year, when charitable giving becomes rushed and routine, might be the best time to review how you divide your donations.
abstract: Ron Lieber Your Money column says that as the end of the year approaches, and charitable giving becomes rushed and routine, it may be the best time to review how one divides their donations among causes and charities.
lead_paragraph: This time of year, when charitable giving becomes rushed and routine, might be the best time to review how you divide your donations.
